data.title: Optometrist in Fort Wayne
data.meta_description: Fort Wayne Vision Associates wants to provide you with the best possible optical care. Call (260) 582-4020 or visit our office in Fort Wayne.
data.text:
At our state-of-the-art practice in Fort Wayne, our mission is to preserve, restore and enhance the vision of every member of your family. Since 2004, we have been committed to providing compassionate and personalized eye care to patients in Fort Wayne and the surrounding communities. We are independent eye doctors with an exclusive agreement with the national chain, Dr. Barnes' Eyemart Express.

We offer total comprehensive eye care services including complete eye examinations and emergency eye care as well as the diagnosis and treatment of many eye conditions. Our team of friendly and dedicated professionals are committed to providing expert care using the latest technology and advanced training in a comfortable and relaxed atmosphere.

We pride ourselves on taking the time to explain your condition and treatment options. We will guide you through the entire treatment process and answer any questions that you may have.

We look forward to getting to know you and your family and taking care of your eye and vision needs. If you would like to make an appointment or have any questions, please call us at the number listed above.
